name: 黃希敏
objective: 本課程旨在進一步加強學生的口語表達溝通之能力。經由合宜的活動設計，如小組討論，與英語談話情境的塑造，如面談，學生將獲得充分機會以演練聽講的技巧。
schedule:
Week 01  Toying with Disaster 
Week 02  Scoop Dreams 
Week 03  Send in the Crowns 
Week 04  The Last Supper 
Week 05  Lights! Camera! Transaction! 
Week 06  Crimes of Fashion 
Week 07  HOLIDAY
Week 08  Barking Up the Wrong Tree   
Week 09  MIDTERM
Week 10  A Tale of Two Leaders 
Week 11  Bringing Down the House
Week 12  Runaway Pride 
Week 13  The Butt Stops Here 
Week 14  The Pepsi  Challenged 
Week 15  FIELD TRIP (to the “UK Education Advisory Service”)
Week 16  Sweet & Lowdown  Intellectual Horsepower 
Week 17  Intellectual Horsepower
Week 18	FINAL
scorePolicy:
1. Small Group Discussion and Oral Report   30%
2. Midterm + Final                          70%
